sentences.en: Did the skin that goes up personally suntan how to bleach?

sentences.en: Does dry skin suntans easily or wet suntan easily?

sentences.en: Get a blanket and suntan lotlon,'cause you'll never get off that beach.
sentences.cn: 拿条毯子和放晒霜, 因为你永远不会离开沙滩.

sentences.en: I got this suntan playing golf the other day.
sentences.cn: 我的皮肤在前几天打高尔夫球时晒黑了.

sentences.en: I want to buy suntan oil, do you have some?
sentences.cn: 我想买防晒油, 你们有 吗 ?

sentences.en: My sister smeared herself with suntan oil and slept by the swimming pool all day.
sentences.cn: 我姐姐抹了些防晒油，一整天睡在游泳池边。

sentences.en: My sister smeared herself with suntan oil and slept by the swimming pool.

sentences.en: Oil based make - up , suntan oil, hair gels and sprays.
sentences.cn: 油性的 化妆, 防晒霜, 发胶和发喷.

sentences.en: She anointed herself with suntan lotion.
She playfully rubs suntan lotion on his neck.
sentences.cn: 她开玩笑地把防晒露擦到他脖子上。

sentences.en: She wore a while T - shirt to show off her suntan.
sentences.cn: 她穿了一件白色 T 恤以显示其晒黑的肌肤.

sentences.en: Take your suntan lotion with you so that you won't get burnt.
sentences.cn: 带上防晒油,以免被晒黑了.

sentences.en: The beach is a good place to get suntan.
sentences.cn: 海滩是个让皮肤晒成古铜色的好地方.

sentences.en: They want to go to the Bahamas and get a suntan.
sentences.cn: 他们想去巴哈马群岛把皮肤晒黑。

sentences.en: This suntan lotion convinces the Black girl of its good effect.
sentences.cn: 这种防晒油的良好效果,使黑姑娘心服口服!

sentences.en: Where have you been to get that suntan?
sentences.cn: 你上哪儿去了，晒得黑黑的？

words.tran_cn: 晒成古铜色皮肤（suntan的过去分词）

trans.tran_en: brown skin that someone with pale skin gets after they have spent time in the sun
